mapper.delete: DELETE FROM inquiry WHERE inquiryid=#{inquiryid} AND custid=#{custid}
mapper.update: UPDATE inquiry SET icate=#{icate}, icontent=#{icontent} WHERE inquiryid=#{inquiryid} custid=#{custid}
mapper.select: SELECT x.inquiryid, x.custid, x.icate, x.icontent, x.file, x.iprocess, x.rdate FROM ( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rn, a.inquiryid, a.custid, a.icate, a.icontent, a.file, a.iprocess, a.rdate FROM( SELECT inquiryid, custid, icate, icontent, file, iprocess, rdate FROM inquiry order by inquiryid DESC) A, (SELECT @rownum:=0)R WHERE @rownum <= #{pageNum}*#{total}) x WHERE x.rn > (#{pageNum}-1)*#{total}
